actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that, after January 1, 1975, Memorial Day be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans' Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.

summary.text: Provides that, after January 1, 1975, Memorial Day shall be observed on May 30 of each year (rather than the last Monday in May) and Veterans Day shall be observed on the November 11 of each year (rather than the fourth Monday in October).

titles.title: A bill to provide that, after January 1, 1975, Memorial Day be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans' Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.
